enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: Scientific and methodological aspects of the Brazilian proposal
sentences: The Secretariat highlighted a recent expert meeting.
BRAZIL highlighted attribution of causes and consequences when assessing contributions to climate change.
Opposed by SAUDI ARABIA and supported by MEXICO and the EU, he recommended renewing SBSTAs mandate on this issue.
The US, CANADA and AUSTRALIA expressed concern about the lack of rigour of research on attribution.
Consultations will be conducted by Murray Ward (New Zealand) and Gylvan Meira Filho (Brazil).
